name: Twin Stick Tennis
description:
Welcome, aspiring ball smacker,

Twin Stick Tennis mixes tennis simulation with wacky arcade tennis. Just like real tennis, this game is about court positioning, shot preparation, and timing smacks. Customize your experience by adjusting the game pace through ball and racket selection.

Combine these elements you can play slow tactical padel matches or test your reflexes in lightning-fast tennis matches. Victory is at your fingertips as you have full control of the player and racket (see gif above). Celebrate becoming a champion or give your racket a stare of disapproval.

Have fun smacking balls!

Play Tennis

Play some epic high pace tennis matches

Play Padel

Smack the ball around the walls to outplay your opponent!

Special Shots Featured

Spice up your game with: Topspin, Backspin, Power shots, Drop shots and Lobs.

Court Surfaces

All major court surfaces included:

Customize Court Sizing

Resize the court to customize your ball smacking experience.

Train Against the Ball Cannon

Test your reflexes against the brutal ball cannon.

Other Features

  • Get good and unlock new balls, rackets and courts
  • Disable/Enable tennis rules (double hits, wall hits, player hits, volley on serve and hits on the wrong side of the net)
  • Local multiplayer mode to compete with your friends
  • Auto-balancing mode, shrinking racket size for the winning player, growing racket size for the losing player
  • Diverse CPU play styles
  • Up to 144 fps supported
